reasoning: Asthma incidence of new diagnoses approximately 400 per 100k person-years, with prevalence of 4500 per 100k (4.5% global population). Data from Global Burden of Disease and WHO studies circa 2005.
source: Masoli M et al. (2004). The global burden of asthma: executive summary of the GINA Dissemination Committee report. Allergy. 59(5):469-478
